Package edu.handong.csee.java.chatcounter

Class FileLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.handong.csee.java.chatcounter.FileLoader

  • public class FileLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    This class lists all the files into the array then extracts the messages from each file into two separate ArrayList one for CSV and one for TXT
    Author:
    to291
